mapper.insert: INSERT INTO travel_schedule (m_idx, m_email, m_nickname, period_start, period_end, title, day_number, city_name, label_number, place_name, place_address) VALUES (#{m_idx}, #{m_email}, #{m_nickname}, #{period_start}, #{period_end}, #{title}, #{day_number}, #{city_name}, #{label_number}, #{place_name}, #{place_address})
